Text: oh my god, this is so,so,so kool, thank you so much, you know how windows 7 advertized that you could throw icons around and group them together to save space, and it looked 3d, let me tell you, this really makes that come to life, i'm so excited right now i can hardly type. all i can say is OH MY GOD. i would highy recomend trying this, and give props to stonerz101, great job, well done
